course_description: Master Python fundamentals from scratch in this hands-on beginner course. Learn to write clean, efficient code through real-world projects while building a rock-solid foundation for data science, web development, and automation careers.
course_overview: This comprehensive course covers Python syntax, data types, control structures, functions, file handling, and basic object-oriented programming. Through 50+ interactive exercises and 3 portfolio projects (including a weather data analyzer and quiz application), students gain practical experience solving real problems. The curriculum emphasizes debugging techniques, code readability best practices, and transition pathways to advanced Python domains.
target_audience: Absolute beginners with no coding experience, career switchers, and students seeking essential programming skills for technical roles
learning_outcomes: Write executable Python scripts using variables, loops, and conditionals
Explain core programming concepts including data types and functions
Create modular programs by defining and calling custom functions
Debug syntax and logic errors using Python's error messages
Manipulate text files through reading and writing operations
Apply object-oriented principles to design simple classes
